entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:46 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
